resources.string: OpenSeizureDetector Dialler Will Dial the Phone numbers entered into the main OpenSeizureDetector App when a seizure detecion Alarm is generated.\n\nYou can close this window without affecting the alarm function.

WARNING - THIS APP WILL DIAL THE FIRST NUMBER ON THE LIST OF EMERGENCY CONTACTS IN OpenSeizureDetector WHEN A SEIZURE IS DETECTED.
THERE ARE OBVIOUSLY PRIVACY ISSUES ASSOCIATED WITH THIS

*** MAKE SURE YOU REALLY WANT TO USE THIS FEATURE ****

If not, use the Uninstall button below to remove the dialler app.
